As part of the newly reorganized Makoto Multimedia Dojo at 
http://www.shinsengumihq.com/MFD.htm, there's a new "radio show" in 
production now, called "The Kyokuchou Hour." It's hosted by Kondou and 
Hijikata, but the other captains (and connected people) appear too. And they 
want to hear from you-- so send in your fanmail to patriot014@... , 
and they'll read it on the show!

-M.
